description: The BYD Tang L has recently been spotted in China, showcasing its striking design ahead of its highly anticipated launch. As the brand's new flagship SUV, the Tang L will be available in both battery electric vehicle (BEV) and plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV) variants. The exterior features an innovative dual-layer headlamp arrangement and a modern silhouette, while the interior boasts a six-seat configuration and advanced technology. This model represents BYD's commitment to evolving its design language and enhancing its product lineup, generating significant excitement among automotive enthusiasts and potential buyers alike.
title: BYD Tang L Spotted in China Ahead of Official Launch

description: Laughing Buddha, the Kannada film produced by Rishab Shetty, has made its digital debut on Amazon Prime Video. Released seven weeks after its theatrical premiere, the movie tells the story of a kind-hearted police officer facing personal challenges. Despite positive reviews, the film struggled at the box office but is now finding new life on a streaming platform. Directed by M. Bharath Raj, the film stars Pramod Shetty, Teju Belawadi, Sundar Raj, and Diganth.
title: Laughing Buddha Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video

description: A team of astronomers from Penn State and the SETI Institute has conducted a significant study on the TRAPPIST-1 star system, aiming to detect possible radio signals between its planets. Over 28 hours, they explored for indications of communication similar to those we use on Earth. Although no signals were found, the research highlighted promising new methods for future searches, positioning TRAPPIST-1 as an ideal target for studying extraterrestrial technology and potential life beyond our solar system.
title: New Research Investigates Whether TRAPPIST-1 Planets Are Sending Radio Signals

description: The Tamil film Lubber Pandhu starring Harish Kalyan and Dinesh, explores the world of street cricket and caste struggles. Initially set to stream on October 18, 2024, its OTT release has been postponed due to continued box office success. The new release date is November 1, 2024, on Disney+ Hotstar. The film features Swasika, Sanjana Krishnamoorthy, and Kaali Venkat in supporting roles, with music by Sean Roldan and cinematography by Dinesh Purushothaman. Lubber Pandhu grossed ₹41 crore at the box office.
title: Lubber Pandhu OTT Release Date: Harish Kalyan and Dinesh Starrer Movie to Release on Disney+ Hotstar Next Month

description: The Darker Chapter delves into the intense rivalry between Juhi and Rhea, half-sisters whose thirst for revenge spirals into a twisted tale of deception. Huma Qureshi and Avantika Dassani reprise their roles in this psychological thriller, directed by Kapil Sharma and produced by Applause Entertainment. The trailer teases dark twists and moral conflicts that will keep viewers hooked. The series will stream exclusively on ZEE5 from November 1.
title: Mithya – The Darker Chapter OTT Release Date: Huma Qureshi and Avantika Dassani’s Revenge Drama Returns on ZEE5

description: The Crew-8 mission’s return from the International Space Station has been delayed due to weather conditions off Florida. Originally planned for Monday, the undocking is now pushed to Tuesday. Crew members Matthew Dominick, Mike Barratt, Jeanette Epps, and Alexander Grebenkin continue their regular tasks aboard the space station while awaiting the updated schedule. The rest of the station crew has also adjusted their routines to assist with the delayed departure when the time comes
title: NASA Crew-8 Mission Delayed Due to Bad Weather Conditions in Florida

description: The trailer for Sriimurali’s upcoming film Bagheera has been released, offering a glimpse into his role as a vigilante by night and a police officer by day. Directed by Dr Suri and based on a story by KGF creator Prashant Neel, the film promises high-octane action and a gripping plot. Set for release on October 31, Bagheera is entering a highly competitive Deepavali box office, with multiple other films launching on the same day.
title: Bagheera Trailer: Sriimurali Stars in High-Octane Kannada Action Thriller

description: A recent study reveals that three asteroid families—the Karin, Koronis, and Massalia—are responsible for around 70% of the meteorites that land on Earth. These families, formed from past collisions in the main asteroid belt, have a higher number of fragments due to their relatively young age. The findings shed light on the origins of meteorites, indicating that younger families are more likely to send debris toward our planet. Understanding these sources helps scientists assess potential risks associated with larger space objects.
title: Research Reveals Three Young Asteroid Families as Main Sources of Earth’s Meteorites

description: A recent study has identified Quaestio simpsonorum, a 555-million-year-old asymmetrical animal found in Australia’s Nilpena Ediacara National Park. This creature, which moved like a primitive vacuum cleaner, featured a unique backward question-mark shape on its back, representing a significant evolutionary development. Fossilised tracks suggest it could move while feeding on microorganisms. Researchers highlight the importance of this discovery in understanding early life forms and the emergence of complex organisms on Earth.
title: Meet Quaestio Simpsonorum: The Oldest Asymmetrical Animal Found in Australia

description: Tata Motors has launched the Tigor EV XE, a compact electric sedan priced at Rs. 13.94 lakh. Equipped with key safety features like airbags and ABS, this eco-friendly car offers a smooth driving experience in urban settings. With a spacious interior, 316-litre boot, and 172 mm ground clearance, it provides comfort and practicality. The 2450 mm wheelbase ensures stability, while features like hill hold control and power steering make it easy to navigate city roads.
title: Tata Tigor EV XE Features, Price in India, and More Details Explained

description: MG Motor India has revised the pricing for the ZS EV, with select variants experiencing increases of up to ₹32,000. This adjustment follows recent changes to the pricing of other models in the MG lineup. The Essence Dark Grey variant leads the increase at ₹32,000, with the 100-Year Edition and Essence Dual-Tone Iconic Ivory versions seeing similar hikes. The updated pricing positions the MG ZS EV between ₹18.98 lakh and ₹25.75 lakh (ex-showroom), maintaining its appeal in the electric SUV market.
title: MG ZS EV Prices Increased by Rs 32,000 in India for Select Variants

description: Poco C75 will launch in global markets next week, the Xiaomi sub-brand confirmed on X on Tuesday. Poco has shared a poster on the microblogging platform revealing the design and specifications of the new C series phone. The company has also disclosed the early bird pricing of the phone. It is confirmed to ship with a 50-megapixel dual camera unit and a 5,160mAh battery.
title: Poco C75 Launch Set for October 25, Price, Specifications Teased

description: To lure victims, malicious actors are now reportedly circulating harmful links that appear in Google search results for 'Soneium.' The crypto community has been warned to avoid any suspicious sites imitating Soneium.
title: Fake Website Posing as Sony’s Soneium Blockchain Reportedly Found in Google Search

description: WhatsApp for Android might be getting a new feature which will make video calls and capturing images within the app more fun. As per a feature tracker, the instant messaging platform is testing camera effects. The new feature is said to add filters, backgrounds, and other effects to the users’ faces when the camera is turned on either to capture an image or during video calls.
title: WhatsApp for Android Reportedly Testing Snapchat-Like Camera Effects With Filters and Backgrounds

description: Pixel 9a is expected to launch earlier than usual with pre-orders starting mid-March next year. Months ahead of the device's presumed release window, its dimensions have leaked online. The leak indicates that the upcoming model is slightly taller and wider than the Pixel 8a. The Pixel 9a is expected to boast a larger 6.3-inch display.
title: Pixel 9a Dimensions Leak Online; Could Be Slightly Taller and Wider Than Pixel 8a

description: Samsung is reportedly working on a tri-fold phone that could be launched in 2025. The smartphone maker will have to catch up to rival Huawei, after the launch of its Mate XT Ultimate Edition in China earlier this year. Samsung is also expected to face competition from rivals Xiaomi, Honor, and Oppo, that are also working on their own tri-fold smartphones,
title: Samsung Tri-Fold Phone Reportedly in Development; Could Debut in 2025

description: Pixel 6 owners are reporting that the Android 15 update has 'bricked' their smartphone, rendering it unusable. While some users claim that the issue occurred after they enabled a new feature introduced on Android 15, other users state that their handset stopped working while they were using it. The Pixel 6 was previously affected by a multi-user bug that also caused some units to get bricked.
title: Android 15 Update Reportedly Bricking Some Users' Pixel 6 Units

description: Gemini capabilities were introduced in Google Chat on Monday. The Google Hangouts successor is now getting the artificial intelligence (AI) summaries feature for unread conversations. The feature is being rolled out to the Workspace users who have one of the Gemini add-ons. Notably, Gemini in Google Chat will be available on Android, iOS, as well as the web client.
title: Gemini in Google Chat Rolled Out for Workspace Users, Can Summarise Unread Conversations

description: Elon Musk's xAI launched an application programming interface (API) for Grok on Monday. The billionaire entrepreneur promised to turn the native artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot developed by xAI into an API in August, and now, users can access and use it. The API key can be generated using the xAI console and users can further customise how to use it. Notably, the pricing for input and output tokens have been kept higher than competitors.
title: Elon Musk's xAI Launches New API With Function Calling Capability, Available With Grok-Beta AI Model

description: WhatsApp may be developing a new feature for its Android platform which lets users share media on status updates, as per the claims by a feature tracker. This functionality is speculated to allow users to search, select and search for the music, courtesy of Meta Platforms’ recent agreement with the Universal Music Group. They can tap on a new button that appears on the status update page to use this feature.
title: WhatsApp for Android Reportedly Testing Feature to Share Music on Status Updates

description: The COP16 summit in Colombia brings global leaders together to address the alarming loss of biodiversity, with over one million species at risk of extinction. Countries will assess their progress on reversing species extinction and take steps towards a target of protecting 30% of land and sea by 2030. The meeting also focuses on financing biodiversity projects, particularly in poorer countries. Governments aim to tackle habitat destruction, climate change, and over-exploitation of natural resources.
title: COP16 Biodiversity Summit: How Nations Are Tackling Global Biodiversity Loss and Species Extinction

description: OnePlus has announced Diwali offers across its product categories as the festive season is approaching. From smartphones, tablets, smartwatches and earbuds the discount sale has something in store for every interested buyer. The sale is currently live and will last till November 5. The OnePlus Nord 4, OnePlus Nord CE 4 and OnePlus 12R are listed with discounted prices.
title: OnePlus Diwali Sale Brings Big Discounts on OnePlus Nord 4, OnePlus 12R, Pad Go, More

description: Black hole mergers are among the most energetic events in space. Two black holes gradually lose energy through gravitational interactions, drawing them closer until their event horizons stretch and merge. Gravitational waves released during the process are some of the most powerful forces in the universe, with part of the black holes' mass converting into pure energy.
title: Black Hole Mergers Explained: What Happens When Two Black Holes Collide in Space?

description: On 23 October 2024, Samoa will host the launch of the Pacific Islands Academy of Sciences, aimed at elevating Pacific researchers' voices in global discussions. This initiative seeks to address regional challenges like climate change while supporting young scientists. Prominent scholars, including Collin Tukuitonga from Niue and Salote Nasalo from Fiji, are among its leaders. Backed by global organisations, the academy aims to foster collaboration and research opportunities for aspiring scientists.
title: Pacific Islands Academy of Sciences Launches to Boost Regional Research and Support Young Scientists

description: In the Kashmir Valley, rare fossils from extinct elephants reveal the earliest evidence of human butchery in India, dating back 300,000 to 400,000 years. The discovery includes stone tools used to extract bone marrow, offering insight into early human behaviour in the region. These fossils, from the extinct elephant species Palaeoloxodon turkmenicus, provide vital information about human-animal interactions in prehistoric India
title: Rare Fossils From Extinct Elephants Document Earliest Instance of Butchery in India’s Kashmir Valley

description: The James Webb Space Telescope has revealed a unique “inside-out” galaxy from 700 million years after the Big Bang. Unlike most galaxies, JADES-GS+53.18343−27.79097 has stars forming rapidly at its outskirts rather than at its core, providing the earliest evidence of predicted galaxy growth patterns. Researchers used JWST’s advanced Near-Infrared Spectrograph (NIRSpec) to analyse the galaxy’s stars and confirmed these findings, which could reshape our understanding of galaxy formation in the universe’s early stages.
title: James Webb Space Telescope Uncovers Inside-Out Galaxy 700 Million Years After Big Bang

description: This week, Yuga Labs introduced a new Layer-3 blockchain called ApeChain, built on the Arbitrum One blockchain. ApeChain is designed to facilitate transactions and enhance the overall ecosystem of ApeCoin.
title: BAYC Creator Yuga Labs Debuts Layer-3 Network ApeChain: All You Need to Know

description: Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) is gearing up to launch its commercial 4G services in India. Ahead of that anticipated introduction, the state-owned telecommunications provider has unveiled a new logo which showcases the company’s three key goals: to provide services securely, affordably and reliably. It has also introduced seven new services including spam protection measures, a national Wi-Fi roaming service, a fibre-based intranet TV service, and a direct-to-device (D2D) connectivity solution.
title: BSNL Rolls Out Spam Protection and Other New Services, Introduces New Logo Ahead of Commercial 4G Launch

description: Snapdragon 8 Elite will power an upcoming Samsung smartphone, according to an announcement made by Samsung Mobile President TM Roh at the ongoing Snapdragon Summit. The Samsung Galaxy S25 lineup is expected to be the first of the company's smartphones to be equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
title: Snapdragon Summit: Samsung to Use Snapdragon 8 Elite Chip on Upcoming Phones; Could Arrive on Galaxy S25 Series

description: Snapdragon 8 Elite —Qualcomm's new SoC was launched during the company's Summit 2024 event in Maui on Monday. During the keynote, Xiaomi's senior vice president Adam Zeng announced that its next flagship Xiaomi 15 will be the first smartphone to feature the latest chip. The Xiaomi 14 successor will be unveiled by the end of this month.
title: Xiaomi 15 to Launch This Month as the First Snapdragon 8 Elite-Powered Phone in Global Markets

description: Gemini AI assistant, the recently added artificial intelligence (AI) virtual assistant for Android smartphones, is reportedly getting new capabilities. Ever since its release earlier this year, one of the major concern was lack of integration with first-party and third-party apps. Over the months, the Mountain View-based tech giant solved some of the issues with various extensions that support access to different apps and functionalities.
title: Gemini AI Assistant Could Soon Let Users Make Calls, Send Messages From Lockscreen

description: iQOO 13 will launch in China this month and the company has now revealed the exact date of the handset's unveiling. iQOO also confirmed the colour options of the handset. It will see an India launch as well, but the company has yet to announce the India launch date. However, iQOO has revealed the the availability details of the upcoming phone in the country.
title: iQOO 13 Launch Date Set for October 30; Design, Colour Options, India Availability Confirmed

description: Ambrane Solar 10K was launched in India on Monday. It is the first solar power bank from the company. The portable charger comes with a 10,000mAh capacity and supports 22.5W charging output. It is equipped with four foldable solar charging panels, an inbuilt LED flashlight, and a digital display, which helps keep track of the battery status of the power bank.
title: Ambrane Solar 10K Power Bank With Inbuilt Solar Panel, 10,000mAh Capacity Launched in India

description: In an official statement, Transak revealed that the personal details of 92,554 users were exposed in a data breach. The platform, which provides a gateway for converting fiat currencies into cryptocurrency, operates in over 162 countries, according to its website.
title: Visa’s Crypto Partner Firm Transak Confirms Data Breach, Over 92,500 Users Impacted

description: Realme GT 7 Pro is set to launch in China later this month. The company has now revealed the India launch timeline of the handset alongside availability details. The phone is claimed to be the country's first flagship model with Qualcomm's newly launched Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
title: Realme GT 7 Pro India Launch Set for November; to Be the First Phone With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC

description: Naughty Dog is confirmed to be working on several new projects. While the studio has not revealed any details about its next game, an industry insider has teased that the unannounced project would favour player freedom.
title: Naughty Dog's Next Game Will Reportedly Focus on 'Player Freedom'

description: Alcon Entertainment has sued Tesla and Warner Bros Discovery over claims they used images tied to the film “Blade Runner 2049” to promote Tesla's new autonomous cybercab.
title: 'Blade Runner 2049' Producer Sues Tesla, Warner Bros Over AI Images

description: Honeywell has signed a deal with Google to connect AI with its industrial data. The partnership will bring together Alphabet-owned Google's Gemini - its most advanced AI technology - and Honeywell's industrial data
title: Honeywell Partners with Google to Integrate Data with Generative AI

description: Honor Magic 7 series was teased on Monday during the Snapdragon Summit 2024, and the upcoming flagship phone from the company will feature the newly introduced Snapdragon 8 Elite chip. New artificial intelligence (AI) features on the Honor Magic 7 series were also shown off, such as an open ecosystem facilitated by an on-device AI agent and enhanced mobile gaming experiences utilising the NPU for graphic rendering.
title: Honor Magic 7 Series Confirmed to Feature Snapdragon 8 Elite Chip; Autopilot AI Teased at Snapdragon Summit

description: ChatGPT, like other artificial intelligence (AI) chatbots, has the potential to introduce biases and harmful stereotypes when generating content. For the most part, companies have focused on eliminating third-person biases where information about others is sought. However, in a new study published by OpenAI, the company tested its AI models’ first-person biases, where the AI decided what to generate based on the ethnicity, gender, and race of the user.
title: ChatGPT First-Person Bias and Stereotypes Tested in a New OpenAI Study

description: Qualcomm unveiled its Snapdragon 8 Elite processor at the Snapdragon Summit in Hawaii on Monday. Soon after the launch, Asus declared that its next gaming smartphone the — ROG Phone 9 — will use the latest Android chip. The ROG Phone 8 successor will be announced next month. It is teased to arrive with AI features and with a boxy design.
title: Asus ROG Phone 9 Set to Launch on November 19 With Snapdragon 8 Elite Chip

description: Meta announced testing facial recognition technology to detect scam ads and assist users in faster account recovery on Monday. The social media giant is specifically targeting “celeb-bait” ad scams, where scammers use images of celebrities and public figures to lure users into interacting with the ad and clicking malicious links.
title: Meta Testing Facial Recognition to Spot Scam Ads That Use Celebrity Images, Faster Identity Verification

description: Google Chrome for Android is testing a new feature that might add a layer of security when it comes to password autofill outside trusted locations, as per a report. The feature is dubbed Identity Check which Google announced last week and is said to necessitate biometric authentication before auto-filling passwords via the Google Password Manager.
title: Google Chrome for Android Testing Identity Check Feature for Password Manager Outside Trusted Locations: Report

description: Redmi A4 5G was unveiled in India on October 16 at the India Mobile Congress (IMC) 2024. It was introduced as the first entry-level smartphone in the country with a Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 chipset. The company said that the phone will be priced below Rs. 10,000 in the country. Now a report has suggested the probable starting price of the upcoming smartphone and its key features.
title: Redmi A4 5G Price in India, Key Specifications Tipped; Said to Get 50-Megapixel Rear Camera

description: Qualcomm unveiled its long-awaited Snapdragon 8 Elite mobile SoC during its Summit 2024 event in Maui on Monday. Shortly after the launch, OnePlus officially announced that its upcoming OnePlus 13 will run on the new mobile platform. The flagship smartphone is set to go official on October 31 in China.
title: OnePlus 13 Confirmed to Ship With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC With Up to 24GB RAM

description: HP OmniBook Ultra Flip 14 has been launched in India, and the laptop is available in two variants equipped with Intel Core Ultra (Series 2) processors. The Copilot+ laptop sports a 14-inch 2.8K OLED display with inking support and the OmniBook Ultra Flip 14 is claimed to deliver up to 21 hours of battery life on a single charge.
title: HP OmniBook Ultra Flip 14 With Intel Lunar Lake Processors Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: 5G network speeds of top telecommunications providers in India such as Bharti Airtel and Reliance Jio have declined significantly, according to a market analysis report. While Airtel emerged as India’s best 5G experience provider, courtesy of the fastest average 5G download and 5G upload speeds, Jio achieved a score of 66.5 percent and won the Consistent Quality Award.
title: Airtel, Reliance Jio 5G Speeds Decline Due to Network Congestion, Faster Adoption Rate: Report

description: Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset was unveiled by Qualcomm at the Snapdragon Summit in Hawaii on Tuesday. Qualcomm’s newest mobile processor is targeted at delivering top-of-the-line performance with upgrades such as on-device generative artificial intelligence (AI) and multi-modal AI capabilities, a dedicated Hexagon neural processing unit (NPU), second-generation custom-built Qualcomm Oryon CPU, and enhanced AI image signal processing (ISP).
title: Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC With Improved Performance, On-Device AI Capabilities Unveiled for Mobile Devices

description: iOS 18.1 Release Candidate (RC) was rolled out by Apple to registered developer and public testers in beta on Monday. The update’s feature set remains largely similar to the previous iOS 18.1 beta versions, bringing improved home and lock screen customisation, a new Control Centre with more options, an enhanced Photos app, and a new Passwords app, in addition to Apple Intelligence features. However, a notable new addition in the iOS 18.1 RC is the hearing aid functionality for the AirPods Pro 2.
title: iOS 18.1 Release Candidate for Beta Testers Brings Hearing Aid Functionality to AirPods Pro 2
